document_data.caption: A map of Callidyrr showing Stirgewick in the south.
document_data.name: Stirgewick
document_data.mainbody: '''Stirgewick''' was a county located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Stirgewick was by far the largest county in Callidyrr, stretching for over {{SI|100|mi|k|long=yes}} from the [[Dernall Forest]] and [[Swanmay River]] in the north, all the way to the tip of the [[South Great Head]] peninsula on the southern tip of Alaron. The southern half of Stirgewick was covered by the rolling plains of [[Bregonshire]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
The towns and villages in Stirgewick were largely spread out, with the majority of the settlements being found along the [[High King's Road]]. These included:
* [[Llewellyn]]
* [[Grady]]
* [[Dorset]]
* [[Kythyss]]
* [[Pembroke]]
* [[Blythe]]
* [[Regent's Field]]
